Latest News Sadguru Sri Chittibabaji Samsthanam has mooted a Ratha Yatra, christened Suvarnaprabhasottama Dharamasanchaaram which is to start immediately in days following Ugadi.
Annadana

Is said to be one of the great services to humanity. Right from the day Babaji established his ashram in Ragolupalli of West Godavari District of Andhra Pradesh till today Annadhanam takes place,three times a day. Attendance at annadhana varies from a 200 to 1000 each day, close to 1000 on Mondays and around 200 on every other day touching 5000 mark on special occasions like Babajiâ€™s Samadhi day.


Support Us

The only source of income for worship, maintenance, Annadana and construction work is, donations from devotees,their friends and their acquaintances. After several deliberations the management has decided to request and appeal to all for donations and framed a set of guidelines.

Dear viewer your contribution to the cause of the Ashram will go a long way in helping the Ashram, in enhancing your prosperity and providing internal peace and tranquility and would also bring you and your loved ones, blessing of Babaji.
